turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I was wanting to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing! What can I get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking an iced black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, did you want to add whip cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, did you want to add the black and white drizzle?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, i got a Grande Iced black and white mocha, with 2% milk and whip cream, and with black and white drizzel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome! can you tell me at which location you'd like to pick it up at?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that in Fort Gratiot Twp?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, great! one moment. let me send it over.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: all set! your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.
